name: Albright Silva
description: i currently work in the US Army as a protective military personnel. i am independent, kindhearted & self organized person,simple, romantic & easy going man looking for good friends & serious intentions. i want to meet a nice & serious woman with good sense of humor . who is interested in settling down & have a happy family…at leisure, i spend quality time with my families, swimming, picnic, camping, gym, barbeque, romance & all pleasurable act.
